commit.message: [fr] added rule VOUS_LE_PPA_1ER_GROUPE #1989, minor other rule adjustments

nodes.bodyText: default="off" or default="temp_off" to see the results?

nodes.bodyText:
Would this also work with more freedom in the second token?
C'est comme vous le dite.
Pourquoi vous faite cela ?
Vous ne me dite jamais rien.
By the way, we will have to prioritize this rule over CONFUSION_RULE_PREMIUM since that rule would suggest the infinitive here. Otherwise it won't even show up in the diff...
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -9026,6 +9026,17 @@ though, and has since been slightly modified)-->
         <example correction="trois fois par semaine">Je joue au Softball <marker>trois fois au semaine</marker>.</example>
       </rule>
       <!-- End of additions -->
+      <rule id="VOUS_LE_PPA_1ER_GROUPE" name="s manquant à vous le ppa" default="temp_off">
+          <pattern>
+              <token>vous</token>
+              <token>le</token>

nodes.bodyText: We might want to include the entire palette of possible apostrophe candidates: [’´'‛′‘]
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -9175,6 +9186,17 @@ though, and has since been slightly modified)-->
       </rule>
       <rulegroup id="D_N_QUE_R_AVOIR_PPA" name="Relative avec erreur d'accord" default="off">
           <rule name="f s">
+              <antipattern>
+                  <token postag="SENT_START"/>
+                  <token postag="D f s"/>
+                  <token min="0" max="1" postag="A"/>
+                  <token postag="N f s"/>
+                  <token regexp="yes">qu[e']</token>
